data.title: Famous Himachali Personalities in Bollywood
data.meta_description: Himchal wonders provide list of some of famous himachali personalities in bollywood.
data.meta_site_name: Himachal Wonders | Just another WordPress site
data.text:
There are many famous Himachali personalities in Bolywood from Himachal and they are not famous in Himachal but also in all over the world. We would share all the people who are most famous from Himachal and they made Himachal proud. We can say Himachalwood in bollywood.

Following are famous Himachali Personalities in Bollywood:

Kangana Ranaut:

is an Indian film actress. She has established a successful career in Bollywood. She did her schooling from Himachal and Chandigarh and start career from fashion one of the big hit bollywood ovie. She had done good movies: Fashion, Queen, Krrish 3, Revolver Rani, ungli, Tanu weds Manu etc.

Filmfare Awards 2015: Kangana Ranaut on winning Filmfare award for ‘Queen’ – Best Actor (Female)

Preity Zinta :

is an Indian film actress. She has appeared in Hindi films of Bollywood, as well as Telugu, Punjabi and English etc. Preity Zinta did her schooling from one of the famous girls school in Shimla that is ‘Convent of Jesus and Mary’, Shimla and reputed girls college of Shimla that is St.Bede She did her English honors from this college. She started her career with small “Perk Chocolate” advertising. Then entered in bollywood and first movie did “DIL SE” after this movie she never saw back and make one by one great movies like Soldier, kya kehna, Kal Ho Na Ho’, ‘Veer Zaara’, ‘Salaam Namaste’ , the Hero, Kabhi Alvida Naa Kehna etc.

International films: Heaven on Earth she was awarded the Silver Hugo Award for Best Actress at the 2008 Chicago International Film Festival

Filmfare Award for Best Actress in 2003

She is also, co-owns Indian Premier League (IPL)

Yami Gautam:

an Indian actress who works in different language films, including Punjabi, Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam, Kannada and Hindi. Yami Gautam was born in Bilaspur, Himachal Pradesh and was brought up in Chandigarh.

She made her television debut with Chand Ke Paar Chalo, Yeh Pyar Na Hoga Kam and her Bollywood debut with Vicky Donor, Badlapur, Total Siyappa, Action Jackson etc.

Her latest brand endorsements include Fair and Lovely, Cornetto, Samsung Mobile, Chevrolet etc.

Anupam Kher:

Anupam Kher is an Indian actor who has appeared in several hundred films. He is belong to Shimla and education from D.A.V. School in Shimla. He is an Actor, producer, director and made Himachal proud.

Anupam Kher is first movie Aagman as a debut then Saaransh, Karma , Daddy, Darr, Dilwale Dulhan Le Jayenge, Kuch Kuch Hota Hai, Hum Aapke Hain Koun, Special 26, Om Jai Jagadish etc.

The Anupam Kher Show – Kucch Bhi Ho Sakta Hai, He hosted TV shows such as Say Na Something To Anupam Uncle, Sawaal Dus Crore Ka

Anupam Kher won huge numbers or award : Padma Shri by the Government of India, Best Actor, Saaransh, Best Comedian and many other award.

Mohit Chauhan:

was born in the Nahan town of Sirmaur district, Himachal Pradesh and graduated with a Master of Science in Geology from Dharmshala himachal. He has sung so many song for bollywood. He started his career with success the song “Dooba Dooba” from the band Silk Route’s album Boondhein.

and he sang “Pehli Nazar Mein Dari Thi”, Khoon Chala, Masakali, Tujhe Bhula Diya etc, movie like : Jab We Met, Delhi6, Tanu Weds Manu, Rockstar etc.

He won so many awards. He is not only singing for bollywood movie but also pahari Himachali songs as well. One of the famous Himachali song “maye ne meriye” is very popular in Himachal
